channel.title: Getting rewards on your own smf forum?
channel.description: I have checked all smf support sites. not there. but how do you get the reward picture under there stars? how did moparisthebest do it?

item.title: Getting rewards on your own smf forum?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.source: Getting rewards on your own smf forum?

item.title: Getting rewards on your own smf forum?
item.dc:creator: @Itachi_Uchiha Itachi Uchiha
item.description:
@Itachi_Uchiha wrote:

Like this?

Admin tab > Manage styles > Headers and footers
Add this to your footers

[code=javascript][/code]

Next go to
Admin panel > Membergroups > Add group
Name it whatever you want, for the star image name put whever you put in the first quotes, in this case you would put revolt/vice.gif

Read full topic

item.description:
@jme wrote:

[quote=“Ca1lum, post:10, topic:104201”][quote author=RXVL link=topic=149128.msg1416513#msg1416513 date=1180782148]
Lol, smfforfree is for noobs that can’t afford $5 a month for a website. I hate that place.
[/quote][quote author=RXVL link=topic=149128.msg1416513#msg1416513 date=1180782148]
Lol, smfforfree is for noobs that can’t afford $5 a month for a website. I hate that place.
[/quote]Wow Nice way to Wreck yourself BAD

You use SMFFORFREE Ohhh Mr i hate SMFFORFREE your forum
And look its a SMFFORFREE forum… ;D

Enough about tht Frell do you understand or cant you understand me lol?[/quote]

Err no it isn’t. He installed SMF on his web space. It’s not a smfforfree forum though.

item.title: Getting rewards on your own smf forum?
item.dc:creator: @Sick_of_Air Sick of Air
item.description:
@Sick_of_Air wrote:

TBH, I don’t think you can do it for SMFForFree… I think Mopar was able to do it because he used SMF, or simpleforummachines.org, in which you can set up the forums just way you like, you just have to have your own website to upload them to.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting rewards on your own smf forum?
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

[quote=“Ca1lum, post:6, topic:104201”]I posted that: Adding the pictures it is in “forum profile info” then you choose picture from file and upload on these forums mopar has it set to admins/mods only… look heres a pic


and upload your pic staff member ect…

Now to get the little pics like Staff member and stuff you gotta make your own or use moparisbest one’s but you would have to ask him if you could use them[/quote]

I dont want a avatar… i want like RXVL has… like IRC legend. etc.

Read full topic
item.source: Getting rewards on your own smf forum?

item.title: Getting rewards on your own smf forum?
item.dc:creator: @wonderguy6 Doc. Booty
item.description:
@wonderguy6 wrote:

No.

What you do:

Make a new post group call it what/ever

Now instead of stars, assign a picture to that area.
Then search the SMF Website for the Multi Stars mod.

Read full topic

The rep? or the picture?

If you wanted like a reward system rep etc : http://www.smfsupport.com/support/guides_and_tutorials/guide_adding_karma_rep_or_what_ever_you_want_to_call_it_version_2-t3537.0.html;msg17998#msg17998
